span.span: Defines values for specifying how the height of a row is adjusted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項可以調整其每個資料列的慣用高度為基礎的資料列。The control can resize its rows based on the preferred height of each row. 慣用的資料列高度會顯示該資料列中的最大資料格的值所需的最小高度。The preferred row height is the minimum height required to display the largest cell value in that row. 大小不同模式可讓您指出哪些儲存格用來計算新的高度 （標頭資料格或非標頭資料格），以及是否要調整所有資料列或目前顯示的資料列的大小。Different size modes let you indicate which cells are used to calculate the new heights (either header cells or non-header cells) and whether to resize all rows or only the rows that are currently displayed. 調整大小的資料列子集適合使用 多個資料列時，避免對效能帶來負面影響。Resizing a subset of rows is useful to avoid a performance penalty when working with many rows of data. 以內容為基礎的自動調整大小，可防止使用者調整資料列的高度，以滑鼠。Content-based automatic resizing prevents users from adjusting row heights with the mouse. 這個列舉型別由控制方法。This enumeration is used by the control method. 如需有關調整大小模式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about sizing modes, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會調整大小以符合其非行首儲存格的內容控制項中的第三個資料列。The following code example resizes the third row in the control to fit the contents of its nonheader cells. 此程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 以程式設計方式調整儲存格為 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的 內容符合](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Programmatically Resize Cells to Fit Content in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md).
